definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: When the panel surface is soiled, wipe it with absorbent cotton or other soft cloth.
sentences.chinese: 面板表面弄髒時，用脫脂棉或其他軟布擦拭。

sentences.english: While cleaning the rod mechanism do not use absorbent cotton or other fibrous materials.
sentences.chinese: 清潔杆機械時不要用脫脂棉或其它纖維材料。
